description: This header defines utility functions for file synchronization and JSON settings persistence within the Utils namespace, including functions to sync file contents to disk and persist JSON data to a file.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes the file on disk by opening a file, flushing buffers, and calling fsync to ensure data is written to disk.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON value to a file under a specific key, creating or opening the file as needed, updating the JSON object, and synchronizing the file to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
